data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Surajpur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Surajpur, Chhattisgarh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Surajpur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Surajpur. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Surajpur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Majhwar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Majhwar people know you.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 222 believers in Surajpur, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Surajpur, Chhattisgarh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Surajpur, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 20,200.

We estimate Surajpur has 222 people who might know Jesus, 245 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,733 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 222 believers in Surajpur to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 19,978 lost friends and neighbors.
